name: Cat Sandbox
description:
Introducing Cat Sandbox - guide cute cats through puzzles! Safely lead them to comfy cardboard homes using physics and destruction.

Cat-saving Adventure

Help cute cats find their way home! Use tools like bombs, mines, sand, and water to create paths. Watch the magic happen as everything reacts!

Nostalgic Pixel Art

Enjoy classic pixel art style cats. It's like a cozy blanket for cat lovers and gamers!

Fun Physics Puzzles

Every level is a new puzzle adventure! Think and plan your moves. Each one counts. See your solution come to life!

For Cat Lovers

If you love cats, this game is for you. Guide them step by step to safety. Cat Sandbox is our way of saying "we love cats!"

Join the Fun

Download Cat Sandbox now and start your cat-saving adventure!
